definition: rounded work, i.e. moulded by hammering (repousse)
kjvTranslation: beaten (out of one piece, work), upright, whole piece.

translations.bg: закръглена работа, т.е. оформена чрез удряне с чук (repousse)
translations.da: afrundet arbejde, dvs. formet ved at hamre (repousse)
translations.de: gerundete, d.h. durch Hämmern geformte Arbeiten (Repousse)
translations.el: στρογγυλεμένη εργασία, δηλ. διαμορφωμένη με σφυρηλάτηση (repousse)
translations.es: trabajo redondeado, es decir, moldeado mediante martilleo (repousse)
translations.fr: travail arrondi, c'est-à-dire moulé par martelage (repousse)
translations.id: pekerjaan yang dibulatkan, yaitu dicetak dengan cara dipalu (repousse)
translations.it: lavoro arrotondato, cioè modellato a colpi di martello (repousse)
translations.ko: 둥근 작업, 즉 망치질로 성형(리푸스)한 작업
translations.lt: apvalios formos, t. y. suformuotos kalant (repousse)
translations.lv: noapaļoti, t. i., veidoti ar āmuru (repousse)
translations.nb: avrundet arbeid, dvs. formet ved hamring (repousse)
translations.nl: afgerond werk, d.w.z. gevormd door hameren (repousse)
translations.pt: trabalho arredondado, isto é, moldado por martelagem (repousse)
translations.ro: lucrare rotunjită, adică modelată prin ciocănire (repousse)
translations.sk: zaoblená práca, t. j. tvarovaná kladivom (repousse)
translations.sv: rundat arbete, d.v.s. format genom hamring (repousse)
translations.uk: закруглена робота, тобто відлита за допомогою молотка (репус)
